short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily and quickly convert between bit measurements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How many times have you needed to do a quick bit conversion? For some of us it happens quite often.
This tiny extension allows you to very easily do simple bit conversions with no extra configuration needed.
It's small, unobtrusive, and easy.

Install this free extension to have this handy converter ready whenever you need it!
